title: I've Been Lying to My Kids About Their Dad
description:
Amanda has been keeping secrets from her children about their father and wants Dr. Laura's advice on how to explain why he is out of their lives.

Email questions or comments: drlaura@drlaura.com 

Participate on the radio program: call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
